title: Charlie Young (baseball)
text: Charles Young (January 12, 1893 – May 12, 1952) nicknamed "CY", was a <a href="professional%20baseball">professional baseball</a> <a href="pitcher">pitcher</a>. He played for one season in <a href="Major%20League%20Baseball">Major League Baseball</a>, appearing in 9 games for the <a href="Baltimore%20Terrapins">Baltimore Terrapins</a> of the <a href="Federal%20League">Federal League</a> during the 1915 season.
